revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Token | name = Open door tagged 222 | class = OpenDoor222 | game = Strife | convid = 302, 284, 301 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:DummyStrifeItem|DummyStrifeItem]]→OpenDoor222
A dummy item that when activated opens all doors with tag 222. It is invisible in the inventory and can not be used by player, instead it is used in dialogs. It exists due to Strife's lack of scripting, which uses dummy items like this one. It exists solely for compatibility with the original Strife maps. Nowadays, it is recommended to use ACS in custom maps, instead. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR OpenDoor222 : {{Class|DummyStrifeItem}} native {}
